author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Preheat oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Mix the grated cheese and egg yolks in a mixing bowl. In a clean mixing bowl, whisk the egg whites until stiff peaks form when the whisk is removed.  Fold the egg whites into the cheese mixture. Heat the olive oil in a small non-stick frying pan and add the egg mixture. Cook in the oven for 10-12 minutes until risen and golden. To serve the soufflé, place it on a white plate and dust with paprika.
ingredients: 200g/7oz Red Leicester, grated,  4 free-range eggs, separated,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tsp paprika, for dusting
